name: ReBirth (itch) (Tomate Salat)
description:
Controls

Move: A/S or Arrow Keys

How To Play

You start with the blue cube. Try to avoid red cube in order to get points.

If the red cube hits you then you'll become reborn as red. From now on you have 5 tries to hit the blue cube. If you fail: gameover. Otherweise you will be blue again.

Good Luck - Have Fun
